general.gigTitle: design, develop and host your wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
YOUR REQUIREMENTS + MY EFFORTS = QUALITY WORK.

I Hold a Professional Degree with Over 2+ Years of Experience in the Industry. The Experience Broadened my Expertise and Creativity Tremendously. If You Need a Skilled and Communicative Web Developer & Designer, Feel Free to Contact me!

MY EXPERTISE AREA :
• Laravel, CodeIgniter.
• Setup and Customization Of Laravel
• API Development
• WordPress
• WordPress Fix
• WordPress Plugins development
• HTML5, CSS3, JAVASCRIPT,  Bootstrap, jQuery.
• Database Design & Development
• MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MS Access.
• NoSQL

Thanks & Regards
MUZUAMMAL!

description.content:
If you are looking to create a WordPress Website or Blog for your business then look no further, you're at the right place.


We build beautiful & effective websites using a strategy-first approach designed to grow your business. We strive to make your website not just a beautiful non-material brand, but an investment with a positive return.

What you'll Get In Return?

  •   Responsive Web Design (Mobile, Desktop, Tablet Compatible)
  •   Easily Maintainable & Upgradable Responsive web
  •   Slider/carousal Integration
  •   Website Speed & Security
  •   S.E.O optimized & fast loading
  •   Content uploaded to your blog
  •   Live Chat 
  •   Contact Form, Google Analytics , Map, Blog Integration
  •   Social media, Testimonies & SSL integration
  •   Woocommerce ( Add To cart, Wishlist, Checkout, Shipping and payments )
  •   High Definition Images and icons for your business web-site
  •  Eye Caching Design 
  •   Complete Free Guidance

Why me?

  1. Deliver after your complete satisfaction.
  2. Quick response / Keep you updated with progress.
  3. Flawless & Tested Plugin.
  4. Best Practices & Quality Standard Code.
  5. Install on multiple sites with no issue.
  6. Plugin Guide Video will be provided.
  7. Available for future maintenance (SEE FAQS).

reviews.comment: delivered on time and great comms
I found muzammil to be very efficient, pleasant to work with and took the time to explain to me how things work.
Great work! Helped a ton and great with communication, will use again!
